snippet: Carl Edwards, making his first Nationwide start of the season, beat Brad Keselowski on a two-lap dash to the checkered flag on Saturday to win the Zippo 200 at Watkins Glen International.
abstract: Carl Edwards wins Nascar race at Watkins Glen International in upstate New York.
lead_paragraph: Carl Edwards, making his first Nationwide start of the season, beat Brad Keselowski on a two-lap dash to the checkered flag on Saturday to win the Zippo 200 at Watkins Glen International.

headline.seo: Carl Edwards Wins Nascar Nationwide Race at Watkins Glen
headline.main: Edwards Wins Nascar Nationwide Race at Watkins Glen
